Portal 2 ist ein schönes einzel aber auch ein multi-player game. Schönes level designen kreative Ide mit den Portalen und eine solide Spieldauer von 3-4 Stunden im single-player. 

Pro:
-gutes puzzle Spiel
-multi-player
-sieht für die zeit gut aus

Kontra:
-man muss erstmal verstehen wie die puzzel gehen

Overall gutes spiel sehr empfehlenswert wenn man mal etwas neues will. 
8/10
Short but very entertaining. Levels are well designed and keep you on your toes. Dialogue is hilarious and entertaining to keep it the gameplay from feeling too dull.
Still an incredible Game. Sound design? Great. Graphics? Still hold up. I literally have no complaints about it.
good graphics and fun game and the future of portal
Just like Portal, it's very awesome and a great sequel.

역시 재밌다. 지금까지 해본 퍼즐겜중에서는 제일 재밌었음. 아직 멀티는 해보지 않았지만 내 기대를 져버리지 않을것 같다.
10/10 점

I am a fan of game obstacle courses. This game not only has a simple yet complex path to follow, it also has a very well defined story line to it, as well as clues that tell the origin of "Aperture Labs". I don't play much First Person games, but aside from Gary's Mod, I definitely enjoy coming back to "Portal" & "Portal 2" just for the enjoyment and in-depth story behind the courses.

Extremely Fun / Enjoyable
Has very unique mechanics and amazing story
I would highly recommend for anyone who likes puzzles

This game has amazing physics and mechanics. I also love the story and how funny the characters are. The Co-op mode is also extremely fun to play with your friends. I am looking forward to Valve releasing a third game.
